title: MacBook Air 2019 review: is it the new default?
description: The MacBook Air  Apple has refreshed it with a True Tone screen, a lower price point, and a slightly tweaked keyboard. It's not a huge change, but it's enough for Dieter Bohn to ask: can this laptop finally live up to the Air's title as The Default Laptop?
